verbose_text: Activity of receptor tyrosine kinases, metabotropic glutamic receptors and NMDA receptors lead to the activation of PI3K / AKT and RAS / ERK signaling pathways [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], and thereby influence synaptic plasticity by mediating expression and trafficking of AMPA receptors in excitatory synapses and controlling long-term depression (LTD) and long-term potentiation (LTP) responses [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: expression and trafficking of AMPA receptors
